news_header: Google Maps has blocked reviews for the Gulf of Mexico after renaming it 'Gulf of America' for US users, following President Trump's order. The company has removed negative reviews and defended its actions by stating it protects places during times of expected off-topic contributions.
news_original_title: Google Maps blocks Gulf of America reviews after rename criticism
news_text: Users claim this is censorship, as many one-star reviews have disappeared. The name change aligns with a policy to reflect official US government updates, while the name remains unchanged in Mexico. Apple has also adopted the new name in its Maps app.
